caption: Good waffles and chicken through Uber eats
Tyler the customer service Associate! Was phenomenal! He was Pleasant And professional ! Not to mention the Blueberry waffles and chicken tenders were cooked to perfection! And tasted Amazing
Good food !!!
Excellent food . Hot and crispy chicken and it wasnt a long.wait to be served

If I could give it zero stars I would. Ordered at 11:53 am, waited an hour and still no food! Eventhough its a pandemic I'm trying to figure out how this place operates on a normal basis in a food court. Food court food is supposed to be fast and efficient. The young girls working there weren't making waffles. All three waffle makers were not consistently running to get orders going. When they did make an order, they only use one at a time. I and several people got a refund. Bad business choose elsewhere

First time visiting, The service was okay but the food wasnt. First, It took about 15 minutes prepare our order, which from my experience doesnt take that long to make. Second, the Food was soggy, really soggy. The waffles were prepared early and they let the waffles sit, so it wasnt warm or fresh. The chicken was exceptional but couldve used more preparing. Did not like the chicken and waffles at all. I hope you guys do more to keep the food at a higher standard.

Traveled here because the photos looked great. However, the place was too dirty looking for me too even feel comfortable enough to eat there. Waffle batter was just sitting out in the open on the counter in plastic jugs as though it had been there all day. I posted a picture of a gentleman on his phone at the register. It just seemed like a health hazard. I was disappointed to have wasted my time traveling for unsafe looking conditions. Also, parking was difficult to navigate.
Chicken was good. Tables were not spotless.
Chicken really well seasoned!!

First time customer and would definitely return. I ordered fried chicken and chocolate chip waffles. The chicken was nicely seasoned, but my waffle was over cooked. Connie was really nice and willing to remake the waffles, but I said no. Nonetheless the experience was great and I would go back if ever in the area..
Delicious
Waffles were light and fluffy, but didn't taste like red velvet. Chicken tenders were very good, but the star was the peach ice tea. Delish!
Love this place.....
Love the food here and the service is one of a kind. Their chicken is so freaking delicious and if you haven’t tried their waffles, you’re missing out

I honestly couldn't eat the order after seeing how it was prepared. They also weren't eye appealing. The waffle makers on the counter close to patrons was a bad look especially bcus of the pandemic. (The waffle makers weren't tidy). Something should be between the customer & the equipment making the food. Also watching the employee handle cash, cards, trash and raw chicken with the same gloves really disappointed me. The young male and female working customer service was poor as well. The Overflowing trash bin near food and flour everywhere also wasn't a good look. However, I paid for my order but unfortunately had to discard it. I'll try again in the future, maybe it'll improve. Pics included to back my claims. Again, I'll definitely give them another try. ☹
I really love the chicken and waffles here
Always good when you're in the mood for 🐓 & waffles
Limited selection, insane prices, mediocre food.

Initially I went here because I wanted chicken WINGS & waffles and found this place on Instagram, but they only had chicken fingers. I still decided to try it and I’m glad I did because the chicken tenders were seasoned so well!!! And the red velvet waffles were everything. There was a little wait, as all orders are made to order but it was worth the wait. I would recommend and I would go back.
love them

Came home tonight and saw a bag of Connie's on my porch. Never ordered here my life, didn't know it existed till the grubhub guy delivered someone else's order to my house!  Man that was a good impression, whatever that guy ordered tasted great!  10/10 would accidentally recieve again
username: ariever help i need a second name

caption: I finally got to try their famous chicken and waffles and I’m so upset because the chicken tenders were SOOOOO salty. I can’t believe how salty they were. Like from the first bite you can tell it was suppose to be good but the salty over killed the actual taste and I couldn’t even get my money back. I had to throw the tenders away unfortunately.
The food was good, but the customer service was terrible
Great food, taste excellent. The pricing is fair, the location is warm and inviting environment

i ordered through DoorDash for pickup and DoorDash said 40 minutes but I know that times are inaccurate on there so I walked over there and when I got there my order was ready. It would’ve initially only taken me about two minutes but it took me about 5 bc I got lost not knowing where it was. It’s in the little market near streetz market. Once you go in head towards the tables and go down the hall to your left. This was my first time trying Connie’s and I’d say I’d come again many times. The chicken was juicy and the was just right. The guys working there were super nice and had me in and out in no time.
Ordered my food 20 min ago drove down there and wasnt even  ready.
The best chicken & waffles in the city hands down 11/1/20

AMAZINGGGGGGGGGGG FOOD !!! If your in the area you definitely have to check this place out the chicken is to die for and don’t get me started on the waffles I’m from NYC and this the best food I’ve had since I been out here seriously . Tristan & Montrell really hooked up my meal ! Had it 3 days in a row lol
I could tell the care the workers put into making the waffles. Everything was fresh and hot. I had no problems getting enough sauces. It was an enjoyable experience with pleasant customer service

Chicken tenders were delicious. Waffles were ok. I ordered the Blueberry and there was a very strange bitter taste after every bite. I think Connie's Chicken & Waffles should look into changing their baking powder brand. The one they are currently using is changing their 5 star review to a 3.

The absolute worse location, 3 kids working there don't want to make food, they're just on their phones texting and gets offended when you ask if your order is ready. I highly recommend the management to hire some professional and friendly people. P.S. My last order 45 minutes delayed. Never picking up here again

Heard about Connie’s Chicken and Waffles for some time so I thought I’d treat my wife to Chicken and waffles for her birthday in July, They had no cinnamon or powdered sugar so I had to go with plain waffles. They convinced me to pay ahead of time, gave them an extra 30 minutes from the time they said my order would be ready because it was a Saturday only to wait another hour once I arrived. Young man at the counter was apologetic saying that they only had one waffle maker working (Go to Walmart with the money you’re making) ordered chicken and waffles, got waffles and salty chicken patties (they never said they were out of real chicken) I was charged $30. Complained to the manager and asked for a call.  I did talk to one of the owners who was very apologetic and promised to refund my money, Never heard back even after texting with him.  I would like to say something positive about this business but when you can’t even keep your word after pitiful service there’s no excuse. Very disappointed. Don’t believe the hype!

We stopped at Connie’s Chicken and Waffles on a recent visit to Lexington Market. Connie was outside greeting people and welcoming them and helped us to find out where to purchase a bean pie for dessert! We tried Oreo, chocolate chip and red velvet waffles. All were delicious! The chicken tenders and wings were also fabulous! I highly recommend Connie’s Chicken and Waffles if you are in the Lexington Market area!

Chicken and waffles is such a weird concept. But that hasn’t stopped me from ordering it, and mainly I’ve been disappointed. Until NOW. These guys are smart. Smart: use chicken tenders so you aren’t messing with bones. Smart: make a chicken tender that’s moist, spicy, delicious. Smart: make a waffle that is light and airy and is really a good Belgian waffle. Smart: have your mom—named Connie—work the counter occasionally and charm the customers.
I Really Enjoyed the Music!!! The food was even better and Jason was so kind 😀 will definitely be back!
they’re really cool and care about the food and the customers! I did a tik tok with one employee and another made dope cartoons on each of my orders.
Great comfort food. Staff always seems happy to help!

I came back today to get the buttermilk waffles with 2 tenders. Again the waffles were excellent. Very light, fluffy, and tasty. Much much better than your chains like waffle house or IHOP. The tenders were good and a nice complement.
Great service. Food's even better!
Some of the tastiest chicken and waffles I've ever had. Very juicy tenders with a great crust. Had the crunch berry waffle. Yum!!
Great food and customer service!
The staff was extremely polite and friendly. The food was fantastic. Crunch Berry Waffles and chicken who knew. 😊 definitely recommend!!
I ordered chicken which was over priced, plus had to wait a while just for wings. They where pretty good but not worth the price. I will re-visit to give a full review!
Owner was very welcoming
OMG OMG OMG!!!! THIS PLACE IS GREAT!!! The chicken is seasoned and fried so well!! The waffle was perfect! The service was great! The food is truly impeccable!
Delicious Food!!!!
Finally got a chance to try this place out, it was actually amazing! Probably the best chicken and waffles I've ever had. I'll definitely be back soon! 👍
Best place ever food and staff was so nice and friendly will be back
Love y'all
Good food (only had the chicken and waffles). The service can be slow sometimes.
Waffles and chicken are delicious!!!
Huge waffles
Good for a fast  meal

My favorite guilty pleasure- chicken and waffles! The waffles are perfectly cooked and the chicken is crispy and juicy. The staff our so friendly and nice. I even met Connie, who has such a bubbly personality and greets her guests as family would. I love Connie's Chicken and Waffles ❤
Chicken wings were awesome and the sweet tea.

Well, the food smelled delicious- unfortunately, I didn't get the chance to actually taste it. I placed an order for a chicken box at 6:36pm. At 7:07pm, the young man behind the counter had served three other people (including the homeless gentleman who got his hot fresh waffle free after swearing at me for not giving him the 50 cents he demanded earlier). When I walked over to inquire, the counter man told me there was ' a rush'. When I pointed out that everyone else but me got their food, he wanted to give me a free drink. Next, he told me I should have 'said something.' He JUST then put chicken in the deep fryer. He then gave me the ubiquitous 'my bad' and seemed puzzled by the fact that I had no desire to wait another 15-17 minutes for my food, after being in court for 6 straight hours. He struggled to figure out how to refund my $10.47 Sad. I love supporting local businesses,  but it looks as though it's still Royal Farms for the quick delish post trial celebratory chicken box.
Excellent fried chicken 🍗🐔
Good waffle and great tasting chicken tenders
Rat infested kitchen.

The food is good but the service is horrible, the young girl with locs pays no attention to customers and plays on her phone. My food was just sitting there getting cold while she was in the corner playing on her phone.
You can't beat their fresh chicken and delicious waffles served up by friendly staff. One of the most filling and reasonably priced lunches in Mt. Vernon. Don't forget the hot sauce!
Everything tastes good from their menu
Great, made-to-order food. Slightly depressing location.
So good!
Food is awesome...made fresh and waffles have a variety of flavors! Staff is great and courteous. Definitely one of Baltimore's Best Eateries

I have to say, I was quite disappointed when returning to Connies Chicken and waffles.... and restaurant refuses to sell coffee.   I spoke Connie herself and she saw me go across Lexington Market to go buy a cup of coffee and come back to get my order. That is the second time I had to do it. If the business is that opposed to selling coffee with breakfast food, I will take my business else where and support the Asian restaurant.  Coffee pots are that inexpensive.... I don't see what the pushback is...  While businesses are their to support community, and solve a problem.  A business  needs to support the customers in a community too.  On Friday,  I said to Connies employee, do you sell coffee, and they said no. Then,  I went across the market to some Asian owned restaurant and Asian guy didn't know what he was doing but his trusted Black employee walked circles around his possible employer. I have choices I don't have to patronize your business. I can go elsewhere.
Love  it can't wait to go back
Excellent chicken and waffles. Great service.
Ms. Connie is the sweetest person and the food is just as. TRY THE CHICKEN TENDERS
Unbelievably good! Will be back!
Friendly staff and good food!
Simple and limited selection, but pretty good.
Chicken and waffles was delicious. Don't go there if you're in a hurry cause they make everything fresh when you order so it takes a while.

Super delicious chicken! I got the basket with fries instead of waffles, so can't speak to all the flavors of waffles. But the fries were seasoned and delicious and the chicken tenders were huge, delicious, and freshly made.

Hello Mr and Mrs.Connie My wife and I had to take the time out to write a review for your restaurant...Let us start by saying Thanks for the wonderful service food and you guys friendly character which is a great "recipe" for success which both of us wish for yall.....Thanks for the pics and we will see yall again in the future!!!!
The chicken and waffles was bomb!
Good Custmor Service, Food and Half and Half GOOD! GOOD Affordable Price and Portion

Update- I went back for a second visit during my stay and was delighted to meet Connie. She is so lovely and pleasant. It's so refreshing to meet genuinely nice people. This place was a treat to find while I was visiting Baltimore. Connie's Chicken & Waffles is definitely a must if you're in the Monaco area of Baltimore. Robert was working the restaurant alone and was great. My food was fresh, hot, and delicious. I highly recommend this place. 5 stars!

Hands down the best lunch to treat yourself with if you're pulling jury duty - and even if you're not! The standard chicken and waffles did not disappoint: I chose the tenders, which are tough to keep juicy, and they nailed it. Eat it fresh while the waffle is still hot with a delicate baked crust. Consider going back for more. Realize your lunch break is up and run back to the courthouse.
They have great crunchberry waffles

I was looking forward to trying out the chicken and waffles here. The truth is, there just ok. Not bad not great but ok. The chicken was fried a little to hard for my liking. The waffle was, well, a waffle 🤷🏾‍♀️.  I'm not saying I wouldn't eat here again, I'm just not going out of my way to go there. The servers are nice but I really don't like seeing people on their phones when dealing with customers. In all honesty, you would have to try it for yourself to determine if it's your cup of tea. For me, I'm neutral.
The BEST chicken & waffles I ever had. Hot & Fresh! The guys were so nice 🥰
Great food and very friendly staff. Sometimes it's slow but they've been getting better about communicating wait times.
red velvet waffles and tenders were amazing..... and they support uber eats i'm a huge fan
Delicious

Though I’m originally from Baltimore, I now live down south in North Carolina. My boyfriend and I came back up North for the weekend to visit family and attend a Ravens game and we got hungry for a late night snack in our hotel room so we went on UberEats and ordered from Connie’s. These are some of the best waffles I’ve ever had. I got the Captain Crunch Berry infused waffles with fresh strawberries and maple syrup and my boyfriend got the chicken and waffles. The chicken was so moist and perfectly seasoned. My Captain Crunch waffles threw me straight back into my childhood. The batter was definitely fresh and the waffles turned out perfectly fluffy. To top off the amazing food, the wonderful people who prepared our meals took the time to write “Love Connie” with a smiley face on the top of both boxes. So thank you Connie for making our trip so much sweeter! I would strongly recommend this if you want good old fashioned comfort food prepared by people who genuinely care about the food they are serving!
Definitely going back! Food was delicious! Service was Outstanding!!!!
First time eating here. The food is good and the waffle has just the right texture. Most waffles I have are too tough on the outside when they are made quickly. This place mastered that

Hands down best chicken and waffles I've ever had!!! The waffle was perfect; a lil crunchy on the outside and super fluffy inside, and the chicken tender...my oh my!!! Flavorful, tender, and breaded to perfection. Check them out for sure
Excellent and good is all that I have to say.

Terrible waffles not fully cooked and chicken was cold like shake n bake not made per order would be better they rushed doing the waffle and over priced for two chicken wings and waffle that should been cooked better
I had the most amazing comfort food for a cold day! Waffle and Tenders!   The price was great! We are so lucky to have this restaurant on N Charles St. Stop by and try it!
Fast service and tasty food!

I tell everyone how amazing Connie's chicken is because seriously it is juicy, crispy, flavorful, hot, satisfying and everything you'd want chicken to be. I love the location in the Eats Cafe in the Charles Plaza next to Streets Market because it is convenient and the people who work there are always smiling and friendly. My go to lunch spot more often than I'd like to admit :)
Well seasoned chicken and delicious waffles!  Seasoned ferries are great too!

I was pleasantly surprised when making a stop here.  Quality of the chicken tenders is probably the best you're going to get around here... Not terribly thick as to lose their taste from the breading and they've managed to keep them juicy... Waffle was Fluffy and complimented the chicken better than you think. Fries are fresh and seasoned with Old Bay. They provide you honey mustard, ketchup, BBQ sauce, syrup and Ranch I believe. And the people running the counter couldn't be nicer. I'll be coming back here!
